name: Neon Rampage
description:
Neon Rampage is a game about rituals and as player it's your goal to defeat the enemies without stopping the ritual. As player you can make turn based steps. to kill your enemies. If you kill one enemy you'll have to remember the side of where you killed this enemy. When reaching the next enemy you have to remember from which side you killed the first enemy and do the same action + another action. With every enemy you attack is adds a step to the kill streak. As player it's your goal to defeat the enemies without stopping the ritual
